snippet.title: Drakantos | Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Drakantos is an MMORPG under development with more than 20 playable heroes, competitive PvP modes, and hundreds of PvE missions! 

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2454980?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=comingup&utm_medium=official-teaser

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/drakantos
